articles.title: Tenable slams Microsoft over Azure vulnerabilities - TechTarget
articles.description: Tenable expressed its frustration after working with Microsoft on the disclosure of two cloud flaws that researchers ranked as critical, which the company later silently patched.
articles.content:
Tenable Research has called out Microsoft for a lack of transparency when it comes to cloud vulnerability disclosures.
